dct_title_s: Cameroons under United Kingdom Trusteeship: administered as part of Eastern Provinces of Nigeria
dct_description_sm: Map shows: international, provincial, Nigeria-Cameroons, divisional, native authority and tribal boundaries; headquarters provincial and divisional, towns & villages; lighthouses; customs stations; missions; native courts; four classes of roads and railways; telegraph lines; wireless stations; government medical stations; forest reserves; Trust Territory administered as part of Benue and as part of Adamawa. Native Authority and Tribal Areas are indicated by number. "3000/64/2-52" Original map is filed in the Map/Geospatial Center, map reproduction is attached to companion volume.
